1370: Jurre was born in Die lange straet3 in 1370.
Got married to Segherarden at age 27 in 1370.
Had a son with Segherarden, Jurre, at age 27.
1371: Had a daughter with Segherarden, Thedwi, at age 28.
1376: Had a son with Segherarden, Wouter, at age 33.
1377: Had a son with Segherarden, Wigherus, at age 34.
1379: Had a son with Segherarden, Haghen, at age 36.
1382: Had a daughter with Segherarden, Berta, at age 39.
1385: Lost his wife Segherarden while she was giving birth to Blomart in 1385.
